Own Choice Test Piece Contest
All Saints Academy, Cheltenham Best Instrumentalist - Steve Ellis (solo cornet, City of Bristol Brass Band) Sid Stevens Challenge Trophy for Highest Placed 2nd Section Band - City of Bristol Brass Band A R Watkins Cup for Highest Placed 3rd Section Band - Arrow Valley Brass S H Brookes (Cirencester) Trophy for Highest Placed 4th Section Band - Pillowell Silver John Jones Memorial Trophy for Best 4th Section Trombone Section - Pillowell Silver Graham Watkins Trophy for Winning 4th Section Conductor - Ian Whitburn (Pillowell Silver)
Special Awards (All Sections): Glenys Purvis Memorial Trophy for Best Horn Section of the Day - Abergavenny Borough Randall Phillips Memorial Trophy for Best Bass Section of the Day - City of Bristol Brass Band
Nov. 25, 2016, 1:51 a.m. Nov. 25, 2016, 2 a.m.
